abstract: The tally of restaurants in New York City with three Michelin stars has risen to seven from five
snippet: The tally of restaurants in New York City with three Michelin stars has risen to seven from five
lead_paragraph: The tally of restaurants in New York City with three Michelin stars has risen to seven from five in the company's 2012 Guide, which goes on sale Wednesday. Chef's Table at Brooklyn Fare, which had two stars last year, and Eleven Madison Park, which had one, now have three, joining Daniel, Jean Georges, Le Bernardin, Masa and Per Se.

headline.main: Brooklyn Fare and Eleven Madison Park Get Three Michelin Stars
